MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH5 postcode area of Shotton, affecting properties in Gladstone Street, Plymouth Street and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:30AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because the work required to  repair an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by in stages by 9PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:22PM on 8th February 2021.
